text: Tato ce uttari nikkhipeyya satiyāpi paccāsāya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ
edit: Tato ce uttari nikkhipeyya satiyāpi paccāsāya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: If he/she should keep it beyond that, even when he/she has an expectation (for further cloth), it is to be forfeited and confessed.
ถ้าเธอเก็บไว้ยิ่งกว่ากำหนดนั้น แม้ความหวังว่าจะได้มีอยู่ก็เป็นนิสสัคคิยปาจิตตีย์
Should he lay it aside for longer than that even in the expectation (of completing it), this entails expiation with forfeiture.
